snippet.title: Blender: 26 years at SIGGRAPH! - BLENDERHEADS ep.10
snippet.description:
Enjoy the tenth episode of Blenderheads, a series about the people behind the Blender project. In this episode, the Blender team travels to Vancouver to join SIGGRAPH 2025. The editor and director – documentary filmmaker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews. 

Support the future of Blender: https://fund.blender.org

--

snippet.title: From Artist to Developer – BLENDERHEADS Ep.9
snippet.description:
Enjoy the ninth episode of Blenderheads, a series about the people behind the Blender project. In this episode, we get to know Nathan, a former Blender artist turned developer, as he stands on the brink of a major life change. The editor and director – documentary filmmaker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews. 

Support the future of Blender: https://fund.blender.org

snippet.title: The secret life of a Blender developer — BLENDERHEADS Ep. 8
snippet.description:
BLENDERHEADS - Ep.08 - Enjoy the eighth episode of Blenderheads, a series about the people behind the Blender project. In this episode, we get to know Sergey. We follow his transition from Lead Engineer to Head of Development. The editor and director – documentary filmmaker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews. 

Support the future of Blender: https://fund.blender.org

snippet.title: BLENDERHEADS - Ep. 07
snippet.description:
Enjoy the seventh episode of Blenderheads, a series about the people behind the Blender project. In this episode, we follow the process around Blender's showcase named Project Gold, by @BlenderStudio . The editor and director –documentary maker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews.

snippet.title: BLENDERHEADS - Ep. 04
snippet.description:
Enjoy the fourth episode of Blenderheads, a series about the people behind the Blender project. The editor and director –documentary maker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews. The fourth episode is set during August - October 2023, with new episodes being published on a quarterly basis.

Get the collectible figurines at the Blender Store: https://store.blender.org/collections/toys/

snippet.title: BLENDERHEADS - Ep. 01

The editor and director –documentary maker Maaike Kleverlaan– works embedded in the Blender headquarters to cover the activities and conduct interviews.
